text: Does REGEX differ from PHP to Python
I found this post: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/118143/python-regex-vs-php-regex but I actually did not get if Python's REGEX syntax matches PHP's REGEX syntax.
I started to convert some of my old PHP code to python (due to g's appengine etc.
), and now I would like to know whether the regex is 100% convertable, by simple copy & paste.
